briefdescription.para: Parameterized Constructor. Constructs a CollisionHandler object.

parameterdescription.para: is of type Grid and contains the screen width and height.

briefdescription.para: Checks for collisions between the game objects that are still alive.

parameterdescription.para: is a vector of shared pointers of type IEntity.
is a vector of shared pointers of type IMovingEntity.

briefdescription.para: Returns the points the player has obtained from killing game enemies.
Default Destructor. Destroys a Collision Handler object.

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< IMovingEntity_ptr >::iterator game_objects_begin, vector< IMovingEntity_ptr >::iterator game_objects_end, ObjectType object_type)
memberdef.name: countObjects

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of objects of the specified object type in the range given.

parameterdescription.para: is a iterator to a vector of shared pointers of type IMovingEntity.
is a iterator to a vector of shared pointers of type IMovingEntity.
is of type enum class ObjectType.

simplesect.para: int containing the number of objects.

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< IMovingEntity_ptr >::iterator game_objects_begin, vector< IMovingEntity_ptr >::iterator game_objects_end, ObjectType object_type)
memberdef.name: copyObjects

briefdescription.para: Copies the objects from a vector of the specified object type in the range given to another vector.

parameterdescription.para: is a iterator to a vector of shared pointers of type IMovingEntity.
is a iterator to a vector of shared pointers of type IMovingEntity.
is of type enum class ObjectType.

simplesect.para: vector<IMovingEntity_ptr> containing the copied objects based on the object type.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether a player bullet collides with every other game object near it. If collisions occur both call their respective eliminated() functions. Mushroom will decrement its number of lives while others will set alive status false.

parameterdescription.para: is a vector of shared pointers to IMovingEntity objects of ObjectType::PLAYER_LASER_BULLET.
is a vector of shared pointers to IMovingEntity objects of ObjectType::CENTIPEDE.

briefdescription.para: Updates the centipede train after a bullet has collided with a segment. Sets the next segment as a CentipedeSegment::BodyType::HEAD and updates the collision positions of the segments following the new head.

parameterdescription.para: is a vector of shared pointers to IMovingEntity objects of ObjectType::CENTIPEDE.
is a shared pointer to an IEntity object of ObjectType::CENTIPEDE.

briefdescription.para: Checks collisions between a centipede and a mushroom. If a collision occurs, the Centipede segment goes down and changes direction.

parameterdescription.para: is a vector of shared pointers to IMovingEntity objects of ObjectType::CENTIPEDE.

briefdescription.para: Checks collisions between a centipede and a centipede. If a collision occurs, then both Centipedes go down or up and change their directions.

parameterdescription.para: is a vector of shared pointers to IMovingEntity objects of ObjectType::CENTIPEDE.

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< IMovingEntity_ptr > &centipede, IEntity_ptr segment, Position collision_point, bool poisoned_position, bool move_out_of_collision)
memberdef.name: updateCentipedeTrain

briefdescription.para: Updates the train behind a head that has has collided with a Mushroom or another Centipede train.

parameterdescription.para: is a vector of shared pointers to IMovingEntity objects of ObjectType::CENTIPEDE.
is a shared pointer to an IEntity object of type ObjectType::CENTIPEDE.
is a Position object and contains the position where a head has collided.
is bool indicating whether the head collided with a poisoned mushroom.
is a bool indicating whether the centipede train should be moved to get out of a collision.

briefdescription.para: Checks collisions between a player and other game objects. If a collision occurs, with a Mushroom the player's direction is set to NONE. If it's anything other than a mushroom the player loses a life.

parameterdescription.para: is a shared pointer to an IMovingEntity object of ObjectType::PLAYER.

briefdescription.para: Checks collisions between a scorpion and mushroom. If a collision occurs with a mushroom, the mushroom is set to poisoned.

parameterdescription.para: vector of shared pointer(s) to an IMovingEntity object of ObjectType::SCORPION.

briefdescription.para: Checks collisions between a spider and mushroom. If a collision occurs with a mushroom, the mushroom is set to eliminated.

parameterdescription.para: vector of shared pointer(s) to an IMovingEntity object of ObjectType::SPIDER.

briefdescription.para: A Logic Layer class that determines whether collisions have occurred between game objects.

node.label: map< unsigned int, vector< shared_ptr< IEntity > > >
